segments.text: Good afternoon , ma'am . Can I help you find anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a special on these skirts this week . Would you like to try one on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you . I don't need any skirts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about a blouse ? This one here is the latest fashion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not try on this lovely pair of shorts ? I'm sure they'd look fabulous on you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No doubt . Look , I'm just browsing . If I need your help , I'll let you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take a look at this dress ! Don't you think it's perfect for you , ma'am ? Uh , where are you going , ma'am ? Ma'am ?
segments.speaker: S1
